comment.body:
The description of the Adguard reporting system recommends "Stich It!" as a means of taking long screenshots.
However, when I used it, a screenshot containing many ads and pictures with Adguard turned off was too large in data size to attach it.
The error message did not give me the correct information. It said the "URL is invalid".
I think the support team should change the error message to something appropriate and also specify the maximum data size of the file on the form.
I also think you should review the maximum size of attachments if possible.
This restriction prevents us from attaching screenshots of the same resolution of the same page.

comment.body:
Hi,

>When I have you ON on my iPhone on this webshop I cannot accept the cookies pop up. It won’t go away when press accept.

Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce this issue, so it's probably caused by one of the third-party filters:
```
Adblock Warning Removal List
Fanboy's Annoyances
Web Annoyances Ultralist
I don't care about cookies
EasyList Cookie List
Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List
```
Please try to disable them and then check if issue still occurs.

<hr>

I have added additional rules to hide cookie notice and unblock scroll, filters update should be available in 1-2 hours.

comment.body:
Maybe we could add a JavaScript rule, something like:
```adblock
itemmania.in.th#%#(function(){window.twttr={conversion:{trackPid:function(){}}}})(); 
```
and exception for platforms which do not support JS rules or cannot update/download new JS rules?

For example, this:
```adblock
itemmania.in.th#%#(function(){window.twttr={conversion:{trackPid:function(){}}}})();
```
 could be added to `general_extensions.txt` in Base filter.
And exception like this (in `allowlist.txt`):
 ```adblock
! https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/139049
!+ NOT_PLATFORM(windows, mac, android, ext_chromium)
@@||static.ads-twitter.com/oct.js$domain=itemmania.in.th
```

issue.title: GameSpot.com - Unplayable videos and missing images (AdGuard Annoyances filter) [GDPR]

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.46.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.gamespot.com/videos/payday-3-teaser-trailer/2300-6460303/
https://www.gamespot.com/gallery/all-fortnite-gaming-legends-series-skins-so-far/2900-4070/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.gamespot.com/`

### Issue:
Unplayable videos and missing images, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted!

### Examples:
Unplayable video:
`https://www.gamespot.com/videos/payday-3-teaser-trailer/2300-6460303`/

Missing images (scroll down):
`https://www.gamespot.com/gallery/all-fortnite-gaming-legends-series-skins-so-far/2900-4070/`

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rule:
`||onetrust.com^$third-party`

### Possible fix:
`@@||geolocation.onetrust.com^$domain=gamespot.com`

### Other problem filters:
* **Easylist Cookie List** / **Fanboy's Annoyance List** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/14563/
`###onetrust-banner-sdk`
`/cookieconsentpub/*`
`||onetrust.com^$third-party`

* **MVPS HOSTS**
`geolocation.onetrust.com`

### Related issue (when using CNAME uncloaking):
`https://repo.palemoon.org/Moonchild/lunarblocklist/issues/25/`

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 21H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v108.0.1-1 (x64) (Tracking Protection = Standard)
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.46.0

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Kylie.com - Various breakage (AdGuard Annoyances filter) [GDPR]
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.46.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.kylie.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.kylie.com/`
(Click "**CONTINUE TO SITE**")

### Issue:
Various breakage, due to a blocked cookie consent, which needs to be accepted.
E.g. the images for more YouTube videos (below the big embedded one) are missing, and the Merch items are out of position!

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rules:
`||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^$third-party`
`||privacy-mgmt.com/mms^`

### Possible fix:
```
@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com^*/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=kylie.com
@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/mms/*/get_site_data?$domain=kylie.com
@@||cdn.privacy-mgmt.com/privacy-manager/$domain=kylie.com
```
The last one is needed in order to be able to customize your consents ("**SHOW PRIVACY MANAGER**").

### Other problem filters:
* **I don't care about cookies** (@kiboke)
`/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=~standard.co.uk|~ladbible.com|~theguardian.com|~theguardian.com.|~bild.de|~autoweek.nl|~computerbild.de|~bold.dk|~welt.de|~t-online.de|~sport1.de|~focus.de|~chip.de|~faz.net|~n-tv.de|~wunderweib.de|~helpster.de|~tvmovie.de|~praxisvita.de|~cosmopolitan.de|~giga.de|~ostsee-zeitung.de|~sky.com|~lvz.de|~mein-schoener-garten.de|~boerse-online.de|~tvspielfilm.de|~autobild.de|~aftonbladet.se|~bike-bild.de|~bz-berlin.de|~travelbook.de|~cyberport.at|~cyberport.de|~golem.de|~express.de|~ksta.de|~utopia.de|~sky.it|~tv8.it|~cielotv.it|~bndestem.nl|~volkskrant.nl|~rundschau-online.de|~rtl2.de|~capital.fr|~derstandard.de|~derstandard.at|~unsere-helden.com|~rtl.de|~stern.de|~myaccount.hln.be|~nu.nl|~maennersache.de|~dpgmedia.nl|~destentor.nl|~zeit.de|~ad.nl|~dpgmedia.be|~heise.de|~t3n.de|~11freunde.de|~finanzen.at|~finanzen.net|~insider.com|~transfermarkt.at|~transfermarkt.ch|~transfermarkt.co.uk|~transfermarkt.com|~transfermarkt.com.tr|~transfermarkt.de|~transfermarkt.fr|~transfermarkt.it|~transfermarkt.nl|~transfermarkt.pl|~transfermarkt.pt|~transfermarkt.us|~vip.de|~businessinsider.de|~clever-tanken.de|~fitbook.de|~idealo.at|~idealo.co.uk|~idealo.de|~idealo.es|~idealo.fr|~idealo.it|~meinestadt.de|~metal-hammer.de|~musikexpress.de|~myhomebook.de|~noizz.de|~politico.eu|~rollingstone.de|~stylebook.de|~techbook.de|~testbild.de|~wieistmeineip.at|~wieistmeineip.de|~wieistmeineip.ch`

`privacy-mgmt.com$domain=~standard.co.uk|~theguardian.com|~theguardian.com.|~bild.de|~computerbild.de|~bold.dk|~welt.de|~t-online.de|~focus.de|~chip.de|~faz.net|~n-tv.de|~spiegel.de|~privacy-mgmt.com|~wunderweib.de|~helpster.de|~tvmovie.de|~praxisvita.de|~cosmopolitan.de|~giga.de|~ostsee-zeitung.de|~sky.com|~lvz.de|~mein-schoener-garten.de|~boerse-online.de|~tvspielfilm.de|~autobild.de|~bike-bild.de|~bz-berlin.de|~cyberport.at|~cyberport.de|~golem.de|~express.de|~sky.it|~tv8.it|~cielotv.it|~epaper.volksstimme.de|~volkskrant.nl|~rtl2.de|~si.com|~derstandard.de|~derstandard.at|~unsere-helden.com|~rtl.de|~stern.de|~freenet-funk.de|~maennersache.de|~heise.de|~t3n.de|~11freunde.de|~finanzen.at|~finanzen.net|~insider.com|~transfermarkt.at|~transfermarkt.ch|~transfermarkt.co.uk|~transfermarkt.com|~transfermarkt.com.tr|~transfermarkt.de|~transfermarkt.fr|~transfermarkt.it|~transfermarkt.nl|~transfermarkt.pl|~transfermarkt.pt|~transfermarkt.us|~vip.de|~businessinsider.de|~clever-tanken.de|~fitbook.de|~meinestadt.de|~metal-hammer.de|~musikexpress.de|~myhomebook.de|~noizz.de|~politico.eu|~rollingstone.de|~stylebook.de|~techbook.de|~testbild.de|~wieistmeineip.at|~wieistmeineip.de|~wieistmeineip.ch`
